product_name: Mountain Hardwear Dryhiker T-Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's durable, polyester/spandex Mountain Hardwear Dryhiker T-Shirt sacrifices nothing in comfort while offering all the high-performance features you need, including UPF 25 sun protection. Fast-drying polyester feels like cotton and features an antimicrobial finish that protects the shirt from bacterial growth. Seams are rotated away from pressure points for comfort under a pack. The Mountain Hardwear Dryhiker T-Shirt features flatlock seam construction that eliminates chafing. Closeout.
short_description: The women's durable, polyester/spandex Mountain Hardwear Dryhiker T-Shirt sacrifices nothing in comfort while offering all the high-performance features you need, including UPF 25 sun protection.
